DelegatedWork.description: Allows the app to read the signed-in user's teamwork activity feed.

Application.description: Allows the app to read all users' teamwork activity feed, without a signed-in user.
Application.longDescription: Read all users' teamwork activity feed

DelegatedWork.description: Allows the app to create new notifications in users' teamwork activity feeds on behalf of the signed in user. These notifications may not be discoverable or be held or governed by compliance policies.
DelegatedWork.longDescription: Send a teamwork activity as the user

Application.description: Allows the app to create new notifications in users' teamwork activity feeds without a signed in user. These notifications may not be discoverable or be held or governed by compliance policies.
Application.longDescription: Send a teamwork activity to any user

Application.description: Allows the app to create new notifications in the teamwork activity feeds of the users in this chat, without a signed-in user.
Application.longDescription: Send activity feed notifications to users in this chat.

Application.description: Allows the app to create new notifications in the teamwork activity feeds of the users in this team, without a signed-in user.
Application.longDescription: Send activity feed notifications to users in this team.
